name: Hexarmonic
description:
Hexarmonic is a puzzle game about hexagons, timing and colors. Simple, minimalist but challenging, this game will test your logic, spatial and rhythmic thinking skills in a fun and relaxing way. Easily create, import, export and share levels with friends and find secret levels hidden in QR codes.

Soon on IOS too.

This game was based on a college project by The Fellowship of the Game (https://www.facebook.com/fogicmc/) named ChronoChromatic. It can be found here: https://fog-icmc.itch.io/chronochromatic
